casebody.data:
The State ex rel. American Tool Company, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al.; Glenn, Appellant.

[Cite as State ex rel. Am. Tool Co. v. Indus. Comm. (2000), 90 Ohio St.3d 73.]

*74(No. 00-387 Submitted July 25, 2000 Decided September 20, 2000.) Peelle & Carey Law Offices Co., L.P.A., and David L. Hall, for appellee. Clements, Mahin & Cohen, L.L.P., and Edward Cohen, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed. The order of the Industrial Commission is reinstated.

Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., dissents. Cook, J., dissents and would affirm the judgment of the court of appeals.
